name: Bull Token
description: Created on 2024 on the Binance Smart Chain network with contract renounced and Liquidity burnt in its creation, $Bull Token has grown into a fully functional, decentralized, 100% community-driven project.Bull is recognized as the world's first deflationary token, the first token to create a mechanism to automatically increase liquidity and reward token holders. Perfect Bull token design that increases liquidity according to trading volume. Liquidity increases by 2% per sell. The higher the transactions and liquidity, the more sustainable and large-scale the project becomes. We also refund 2% of tokens every time there is a sale to the owner's wallet, helping owners get good returns when held for a long time.
